vague_description: Determine the optimal production levels of two art products within resource constraints to maximize earnings.
detailed_description: An art store makes large and small art pieces. The store has available \var{PaintAvailable} units of paint, \var{GlitterAvailable} units of glitter, and \var{GlueAvailable} units of glue. To make a large art piece requires \var{PaintLarge} units of paint, \var{GlitterLarge} units of glitter, and \var{GlueLarge} units of glue. To make a small art piece requires \var{PaintSmall} units of paint, \var{GlitterSmall} units of glitter, and \var{GlueSmall} units of glue. The store must make at least \var{MinLarge} units of each large and small art pieces. If the profit per large art piece is $\var{ProfitLarge} and the profit per small art piece is $\var{ProfitSmall}, how many of each should be made to maximize profit?
target_objective: The store wants to maximize its profit from the sale of large and small art pieces
target_constraints: Number of large art pieces is an integer
Number of small art pieces is an integer
Number of large art pieces is non-negative
Number of small art pieces is non-negative
The store uses at most PaintAvailable units of paint
The store uses at most GlitterAvailable units of glitter
The store uses at most GlueAvailable units of glue
Producing a large art piece requires PaintLarge units of paint
Producing a large art piece requires GlitterLarge units of glitter
Producing a large art piece requires GlueLarge units of glue
Producing a small art piece requires PaintSmall units of paint
Producing a small art piece requires GlitterSmall units of glitter
Producing a small art piece requires GlueSmall units of glue
The store makes at least MinLarge large art pieces
The store makes at least MinLarge small art pieces
target_parameters: Units of paint required to make a large art piece
Units of glitter required to make a large art piece
Units of glue required to make a large art piece
Units of paint required to make a small art piece
Units of glitter required to make a small art piece
Units of glue required to make a small art piece
Minimum number of large art pieces to be made
Minimum number of small art pieces to be made
